alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 4:27AM CDT until May 15 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Phelps County in south central Nebraska... Kearney County in south central Nebraska... Southern Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 426 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Elm Creek to near Odessa to near Loomis, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Odessa around 435 AM CDT. Kearney and Funk around 445 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Axtell, Wilcox, Minden, Gibbon, Heartwell and Norman. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 255 and 292. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
